entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 60%
